Type.Name: CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: This is the base class for code access security attributes.

block.para: The types that derive from are used to secure access to resources or securable operations.

The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, and is accessed by the system at run-time. Security attributes are used for declarative security only. Use the corresponding permission class derived from for imperative security.
